mapper.sql: ht_user_id, user_id, user_name, user_code, nick_name, password, status, factory_id, dept_id, telephone, mobile, email, create_user_id, create_time, modified_user_id, modified_time
mapper.select:
select shu.ht_user_id,shu.user_id, shu.user_name, shu.user_code, shu.nick_name, shu.password, shu.status, shu.factory_id,f.factory_name, shu.dept_id, d.dept_name,shu.telephone,shu.mobile, shu.email, shu.create_user_id,u.user_name as createUserName, shu.create_time, shu.modified_user_id,s.user_name as modifiedUserName, shu.modified_time from ocean_dm.sys_ht_user shu left join ocean_dm.sys_user u on shu.create_user_id=u.user_id left join ocean_dm.sys_user s on shu.modified_user_id=s.user_id left join fantech_imes_dm.base_factory f on shu.factory_id=f.factory_id left join fantech_imes_dm.base_dept d on shu.dept_id=d.dept_id
1=1
and date_format(shu.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and shu.user_code like CONCAT('%', #{userCode}, '%')
and shu.nick_name like CONCAT('%', #{nickName}, '%')
order by shu.modified_time desc
